ai-patthana17.32:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in the teachings.)
ai-patthana17.32:1.1_0: He doesn’t give rise to confidence in those without it. Confidences with the thought of giving up a cause or condition as a reason.
ai-patthana17.32:2.1_0: One has not prepared a cause of placing the mind and keeping it connected. Immersion without placing the mind, but just keeping it connected. Immersion without placing the mind or keeping it connected.
ai-patthana17.32:3.1_0: One has not prepared a cause of placing the mind and keeping it connected. Immersion without placing the mind, but just keeping it connected. Love to the teaching.
